Chap. 26 - The East and the West

     Dear Brethren: The Lord has shown me in vision some things in regard to the East and the West which I feel it my duty to set before you. I saw that God has been opening the way for the spread of present truth in the West. It requires much more power to move the people in the East than in the 
                                                                           147
West, and at present but very little can be accomplished in the East. Special efforts should be made at the present time where most good will result.
